_sText:
Details:
This is a remake of the Halo 3 map Crypt as a BA map ideal for GG/DM. Unfortunately i haven't had a chance to play it (in halo 3) so i had to build it based on a few pics... but i took some artistic liberty and made a pretty fun frantic little map out of it. Specs:
40 spawns, buyzones, almost all custom textures, some brush-based props, a few traps, animated brushwork, ext ext
Please visit Clan 5k3's studio for more Halo css maps and materials.
